item.title: Basic Setup VMware On-Prem Infrastructure as Code (Iac) - Part 1
item.description: DevSecOps On-Prem IaC A lot of applications are still on-prem and most resources available today for automation are focused on cloud and very little on traditional data center automation skills.

item.title: Write Better Commit Messages
item.description: GIT OOPS! Question Yep… I have absolutely no idea what I meant by ‘Fix foobar’ 6 months ago. Trying to write better commits fixed bug on landing page vs.
